markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Two-Hand](/Traits.aspx?ID=718)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 283 <sup>2.0</sup>

This weapon can be wielded with two hands to change its weapon damage die to the indicated value. This change applies to all the weapon’s damage dice.
name: Two-Hand

<summary>
This weapon can be wielded with two hands to change its weapon damage die to the indicated value. This change applies to all the weapon’s damage dice.
</summary>
